input.sentences: i was on vacation last weekend .
the buildings were all old and beautiful .
i went for a walk many times .
i had a great time there .
output.sentences: While on vacation, we decided to check out some of the local attractions.
We went to an old theater and it was beautiful.
While taking a walk, we ran into this old house with beautiful grounds.
This is an old monestary we visited.
The city is beautiful from the view up here.
